title: From U.S. player
author: Galaxy
txt_content: I studied in U.S. for this summer. I heard about the update. In U.S., minecraft is one kind of culture. So cool, I bought some minecraft T-shirt(ju ran shi zhong guo zao de)

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content: hello,大部分商品都是在中国制作的，也挺正常，在中国制作省钱啊，

replies.author: HaominFeng
replies.txt_content: 最后那句忽然变拼音= =违和感爆棚

replies.author: HaominFeng
replies.txt_content: 而且默默地说…标题很奇怪啊…不是会用 Player from U.S. 么…
